subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Shani Davis won the 1,500-meter race in Baselga di Pinè, Italy, at a speedskating World Cup event. Davis finished in 1:46.85, ahead of Simon Kuipers, the World Cup leader, and Mark Tuitert.
snippet: Shani Davis won the 1,500-meter race in Baselga di Pinè, Italy, at a speedskating World Cup event. Davis finished in 1:46.85, ahead of Simon Kuipers, the World Cup leader, and Mark Tuitert.
